altername_name: Back Guiner - Yomigaeru Yuusha Tachi - Service Disc
name: Back Guiner: Yomigaeru Yuusha Tachi: Hishou Hen 'Uragiri no Senjou'
overview: Backgainer - Yomigaeru Yuusha-tachi: Hishou-hen "Uragiri no Senjou" (aka Backguiner Act-2) is the sequel to Backgainer and is also a tactical RPG game. The game is clearly inspired by Patlabor & Evangelion anime series. The game story continues from the first game in the series. The gameplay is a classic turn based tactical RPG and the player got a limited range of movement each turn and different kind of attacks to use. The third cd in the package is a bonus disc featuring a collection of images, voices and game sequences.
